channel.title: CVE Feed for UnitedThemes -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for UnitedThemes -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-24927|2024-07-05T17:22:48.373Z -- unitedthemes -- brooklyn%20%7C%20creative%20multi-purpose%20responsive%20wordpress%20theme
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in UnitedThemes Brooklyn | Creative Multi-Purpose Responsive WordPress Theme allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Brooklyn | Creative Multi-Purpose Responsive WordPress Theme: from n/a through 4.9.7.6.

item.title: CVE-2024-24926|2024-02-12T07:09:01.476Z -- unitedthemes -- brooklyn%20%7C%20creative%20multi-purpose%20responsive%20wordpress%20theme
item.description: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in UnitedThemes Brooklyn | Creative Multi-Purpose Responsive WordPress Theme.This issue affects Brooklyn | Creative Multi-Purpose Responsive WordPress Theme: from n/a through 4.9.7.6.
